entity.name: Updates on the Covid-19 situation in the Philippines
entity.description: This page provides real-time updates on the Covid-19 situation from trusted and official sources.

text:
The Palace admitted that it could have increased the country's capability to test for the COVID-19 months sooner.

Back in February, when the country only had three confirmed infections, President Duterte said "everything is well in the country." 

READ: https://t.co/L8hb3vRMBl https://t.co/oJhVu52HWT
